title: How to Cheat on Shrek 2

steps.headline: Press enter.
steps.description: You'll see a text box where you will enter the cheat code.

steps.headline: Enter the code.
steps.description: There are only two codes (Write without quotes). Cheat mode - "i am the best". Obtain All Potions - "Yahoo"

steps.headline: Press enter to send the code to game.
Enter them:
steps.description: Enable cheat mode: L1, L2, R1, R2, ▲▼◄►▲▼▼▼ Bonus games: ◄▲XO◄▲XO◄▲XO■O■O■O and enter "Bonus" to surprise Full Health:  ◄▲XO◄▲XO◄▲XO▲►▼◄▲ 1000 Coins: ◄▲XO◄▲XO◄▲XOOOOOO All levels: (enter in first level only) ◄▲XO◄▲XO◄▲XO▲▲▲▲▲ (You'll hear "That's what I call spreading joy." if entered correctly)

steps.headline: Open the scrapbook in the pause menu.
Enter these:
steps.description: 1000 Coins: LEFT, UP, A, X, LEFT, UP, A, X, LEFT, UP, A, X, X, X, X, X, X Refill health: LEFT, UP, A, X, LEFT, UP, A, X, LEFT, UP, A, X, UP, Right, DOWN, LEFT, UP All Bonuses: LEFT, UP, A, X, LEFT, UP, A, X, LEFT, UP, A, X, Y, X, Y, X, Y, X All levels: LEFT, UP, A, X, LEFT, UP, A, X, LEFT, UP, A, X, UP, UP, UP, UP, UP

text: Shrek 2 on PC Press enter. You'll see a text box where you will enter the cheat code. Enter the code. There are only two codes (Write without quotes). Cheat mode - "i am the best". Obtain All Potions - "Yahoo" Press enter to send the code to game.  Shrek 2 on PS2 Access the level "Spooky Forest".  Enter the scrapbook.  Enter them: Enable cheat mode: L1, L2, R1, R2, ▲▼◄►▲▼▼▼ Bonus games: ◄▲XO◄▲XO◄▲XO■O■O■O and enter "Bonus" to surprise Full Health:  ◄▲XO◄▲XO◄▲XO▲►▼◄▲ 1000 Coins: ◄▲XO◄▲XO◄▲XOOOOOO All levels: (enter in first level only) ◄▲XO◄▲XO◄▲XO▲▲▲▲▲ (You'll hear "That's what I call spreading joy." if entered correctly) Shrek 2 on GameCube Open the scrapbook in the pause menu.  Enter these: 1000 Coins: LEFT, UP, A, X, LEFT, UP, A, X, LEFT, UP, A, X, X, X, X, X, X Refill health: LEFT, UP, A, X, LEFT, UP, A, X, LEFT, UP, A, X, UP, Right, DOWN, LEFT, UP All Bonuses: LEFT, UP, A, X, LEFT, UP, A, X, LEFT, UP, A, X, Y, X, Y, X, Y, X All levels: LEFT, UP, A, X, LEFT, UP, A, X, LEFT, UP, A, X, UP, UP, UP, UP, UP
